0.21.name: wordpress/sno-looken
0.21.description:
This is a great new way for you as a blogger to earn some extra money. SnoLooken is a plugin for coupling blog images to products in web shops, using the service [SnoLooken](http://Snolooken.se Snolooken)

Note that you need to register before you can use SnoLooken.

In it's current version this product is mainly usable for the Swedish audience.

You can find a demo of the functionality on blogg.snolooken.se
